#include<cstdio>
#define MAX 10000007

int arr[MAX];
long long int i,j;
int count=1;
int tt,n;

inline void sieve()
{
for(i=4;i<MAX;i+=2)
arr[i]=-1;

for(i=3;i<MAX;i+=2)
for(j=i;j*i<MAX;j+=2)
arr[i*j]=-1;

arr[2]=1;
for(i=3;i<MAX;i+=2)
if(arr[i]==0)
arr[i]=++count;
}

int main()
{
sieve();
scanf("%d",&tt);
while(tt--)
{
           scanf("%d",&n);
           if(arr[n]>0)
           printf("%d\n",arr[n]);
           else
           printf("-1\n");
           }
           return 0;
           }
